plot outline: Sanjana gets accidentally killed by her lover after they get into fight. He buries her in forest and ask for forgiveness. She becomes a ghost and kills him by pulling him into her grave. After two years, Six students, four boys and two girls, from a medical college come to a guest house in the same forest for research. Soon they begin to experience paranormal activity around them. They are joined by three people crew of a movie who have come for scouting shooting location for their movie. Film takes a dark turn when a crew member is killed in the forest. They try to flee the forest getting killed one by one. Finally only two students escape to nearby village safely.
title: Horror Picture

They try to flee the forest getting killed one by one. Finally only two students escape to nearby village safely.::Vijay
